definitions: in a firm or secure manner

examples.text: a kick that connected solidly with Jonny's stomach
the songs are solidly rooted in traditional structures

definitions: in a way that is physically strong

examples.text: the castle is solidly constructed out of black basalt
he wasn't fat, but he was solidly built

shortDefinitions: in way that is physically strong

examples.text: books were packed solidly onto the shelves
it rained solidly for four hours
I was laughing solidly for most of the half-hour

definitions: in a unanimous or undivided manner
in a dependable or reliable manner

examples.text: the company had performed solidly in difficult times

definitions: in a sound or consistent manner but without any special qualities or flair

examples.text: it's a solidly entertaining movie, nothing more

shortDefinitions: in sound or consistent manner but without any special qualities or flair
